about_the_game:
COMBAT MEDIC


Introducing Combat Medic.

An engaging retro arcade game that throws you into the middle of a battlefield. You must rescue and heal friendly soldiers while avoiding bullets and artillery fire.

Features


The game's highlight is the in-depth medical system. You must use your knowledge and tools to apply bandages, tourniquets, and even blood packs to heal and save your allies, saving them from bleeding out from multiple different injury types.

Injuries include but are not limited to:

  • Gunshot Wound
  • Embedded Shrapnel
  • Amputated Limb

Medical tools include but are not limited to:

  • Blood Bag
  • Forceps
  • Tourniquet

    Combat Medic is a simple, fun game that can provide repeated entertainment. Whether you're scrolling through Steam for a quick, satisfying experience or just looking to switch off and kill some time, COMBAT MEDIC is the perfect game.

content_descriptors.notes: Pixel-art violence, blood and depictions of war.

short_description: Combat Medic is a top-down 2D game where you play as a combat medic. Traverse the battlefield avoiding the hale of incoming enemy fire, make use of your medical tools and use your knowledge to save the lives of fallen soldiers before they succumb to one of their many possible injuries.
